import Header from '../components/header' import Footer from '../components/footer' import Head from 'next/head' import axios from 'axios' class HomePage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { ip: "play.ultracraft.xyz", port: 25582, playerCount: "N/A", ipText: play.UltraCraft.xyz, } } componentDidMount() { const { ip, port } = this.state; axios.get('https://mcapi.us/server/status?ip='+ip+'&port='+port+'', { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }) .then( response => { this.setState({playerCount: (response.data.online) ? response.data.players.now : "N/A"}) }); } handleIpCopy(e) { navigator.clipboard.writeText(this.state.ip) this.setState({ipText: IP Copied!}) this.timeout = setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ipText: play.UltraCraft.xyz}) },800) } render() { return
UltraCraft
